description:
Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips and easy recipes to DIY projects and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love? 

It's Possible.

Helakuru is more than just a keyboard App. It’s a SuperApp with everything you need!
Its truly ours, making daily life easier for millions of Sri Lankans. From typing in Sinhala and staying up-to-date with the latest news, to making payments, bringing creative ideas to life, and chatting—Helakuru has it all, right at your fingertips.
Following are the list of Digital Services offered by Helakuru.

Keyboard

* Typing - Write Sinhala, English, Tamil language & Emoji 
* Prediction Typing - Sinhala prediction support
* Shortcut Typing – Use short forms to effortlessly expand into longer sentences as you type
* Clipboard - Write copied sentences at once

Keyboard PRO

* Spell Checker – Automatically correct your Sinhala spelling with ease
* Personal Word List – Create your own custom predictions for words you frequently use, making typing even faster!


Payments
* HelaPay - Sri Lankan Digital Payment Method
* HelaPay Chat – Effortlessly send funds to anyone you like with our convenient transfer feature
* Reload - Online Reloading for any network
* Bill Pay - Online Utility Bill payments
* Channelling - Online Doctor channelling

Information
* Esana - Real-time News Delivery via Notifications
* Truth - Fact-checking service of mis/disinformation
* Niwedana - Government Announcement service
* Visma - Technological News Updates

Social
* Sithalu - Sinhala Creative Writing Platform
* HelaPay Chat – Connect and chat with your loved ones effortlessly

Tools
* Dictionary - Sinhala/English Dictionary
* Notes - Simple Note taking facility
* Chithrana - Sinhala Photo Editor facility
* Niwadu - Sri Lanka Holiday Calendar

Versions
- BASIC: Ad supported basic version for FREE
- PRO: Ad-free full version for a monthly subscription

Support & Knowledge base: 
0115 580 580
http://m.me/helakuru
support@helakuru.lk

A Proud Sri Lankan Product!

WOW is a Superapp that consists of an array of services that aim to cater to a wide range of digital lifestyle needs! With a heavy focus on personalization, the WOW Superapp will mean different things to different users, from being the go-to platform for entertainment, rewards, savings, and convenience through digital interactions & transactions. The WOW Superapp will offer opportunities to engage, be rewarded, transact, and enjoy convenience in a seamless manner within a single app interface. Users will be rewarded not only for their transactions but also for their engagement with the app, through daily mission accomplishments and exciting gamifications.

Product features

Get WOW’d using the WOW Superapp, the app that does it all!

• Increase your winning chances and stand a chance to win millions from the Mega Wasana draw! In addition, WOW users can scratch & win via the exclusive scratch cards to win instant cash prizes, data rewards, and cashbacks on your Dialog bills.

• Play exciting games in the gaming arena and win data as you play Mega Games

• Enjoy Star Point loyalty point redemptions as well as credit & debit card benefits

• Check out the latest news alerts and engaging content on WOW stories

• Pay bills or reload with ease and earn a winning chance in Mega Wasana for every Rs 50 payment of reloads and bill payments

WOW is your one-stop digital lifestyle app!

HOW2WOW Help Center


Users and Merchants can refer to comprehensive user guides on how to use the WOW Superapp and educate themselves on how to avail all the benefits from WOW. From Star Point redemption to Bank Benefits, My Wallet, My Vouchers to My Points, the WOW Superapp gives an opportunity for users to win or get rewarded while having fun or even while getting their essential online tasks done on this app. In addition, Bonus Data rewards support you to stay connected and enjoy your digital lifestyle.

Contact Us

WOW Superapp is powered by Dialog Axiata PLC. Reach out to us through the In-app chat tool, during non-operational hours you may leave us a message and our help center agents will get back to you within 12 operational hours. WhatsApp to 074 -1616161 or email us on hello@wow.lk

My LECO app keeps everything related to your LECO account in one place. All customer issues, queries, and suggestions are organized, categorized, scheduled, and well managed within the app. An automated response system is integrated, customer support opening times and a link to a knowledge base. My LECO app will track all interactions with customers, so that consumers get a detailed view of the customers’ profile whenever they logged in. Consumers simply enter their email address, phone number and they get complete access. When integrated, consumer can get a complete view of the customer’s profile and all the history of interactions at any time including bills, payments, readings and service information.

Turn every visit into SPARRewards

No more typing numbers — just scan your phone to collect points, unlock vouchers, and grab daily deals.

Shop smarter, track rewards easily, share points with family, and even order groceries online.
Download SPARRewards now and start turning every shop into savings!

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms
Visit: https://www.tinderlove.com/

developer: Shenzhen Well fitness Management Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
HiWatchPro是一款基于蓝牙手环开发的app，使用蓝牙4.0通信，里面包统计睡眠、遥控拍照(通过手环拍照)，闹钟设置，久坐提醒（设置提醒时间防止用户坐太久），抬手亮屏、计步、消息推送、勿扰模式、睡眠监测、找手环等功能。用户可以利用app直观的了解身体状况以及运动状况，是一款轻量型助手型工具类app。


注意事项：
1，运动功能会使用GPS定位，在后台持续运行GPS功能可能会大幅消耗电池电量
2，HiWatchPro已接入HealthKit，可同步运行数据到健康
3，HiWatchPro所产生的一切数据，仅用于参考，不能当作健康状况依据。

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals
- Rematch with expired connections — so you don’t miss out on a great potential date
- Browse anonymously with Incognito Mode and only seen by who you want to see you
- Extend your matches by 24 hours
- Swipe as much as you like to meet more people
- Tap into dating scenes around the world with Travel Mode
- Stand out and get noticed with free SuperSwipes & Spotlights, refreshed weekly

Inclusivity is key
At Bumble, we promise to support and include all forms of love: straight, gay, lesbian, queer, and beyond. We want everyone in our community to feel safe and welcome. So no matter how you identify, if you're looking for a place to chat, date, and find real love, we’ve got what you’re looking for.

---
Bumble is a free dating app to download and use. We offer optional subscription packages (Bumble Boost & Bumble Premium) and non-subscription, single, and multi-use paid features (Bumble Spotlight & Bumble SuperSwipe). Your personal data is securely processed in line with our privacy policy and applicable laws—be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions.
https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms
Bumble Inc. is the parent company of Bumble, Badoo, and BumbleBFF, social networks, and dating apps free to download and use.

Alipay is a leading open platform for payments and digital services in China.

Users with a Chinese ID and bank account can use Alipay to make payments online and in person at various merchants outside of China as they travel for leisure, business, or study. 

Foreign visitors to China can connect their credit card to take advantage of Alipay’s widespread acceptance by tens of millions of merchants across the country. Alipay is not designed or intended for use by foreign users in their home country or anywhere outside of China.

Precious is the cutest way to track your baby milestones and see your baby's development. This app AUTOMATICALLY organizes your baby photos into adorable monthly pictures, growth slideshows, a photo calendar journal, and MUCH more — all with no work required from you.

Precious uses Artificial Intelligence to find the absolute best photos of your baby and uses them to create photo stories that will melt your heart.

You can watch your baby grow up with the then vs now feature, smile at a slideshow of last weekend’s activities, or effortlessly browse older baby pictures in the Photo Calendar. Every one of your baby's monthly milestones is accompanied by beautiful photo frames & collages, made for you. Have fun with your photos by exploring the hundreds of unique stickers we have available to mark the fun activities you and your baby share. 

You just keep taking baby photos. Let Precious handle the rest.

--

Contact us:
If you have questions or suggestions, please email us at contact@preciousapp.com

--

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Precious is free to download. Everyone is welcome to a free 3-day trial period of the Baby Art Unlimited in-app-purchase. A free trial or purchase is required to access content.
- Subscribing to Baby Art Unlimited gives you unlimited access to our premium content and features
- There are monthly and annual subscription options, with prices as listed in your localized app store ($4.99 per month in the United States)
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of your subscription
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and at the cost of the chosen package
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Links to Your Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at https://www.preciousapp.com/privacy-policy and https://www.preciousapp.com/terms-conditions 
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication
- At the end of your subscription, you will be able to keep any content that your received while your subscription was active.

SmartLife is a smart device management App for you to control and manage your intelligent home products easier and to live smarter. 

SmartLife has integrated with HealthKit. It allows you to seamlessly connect your health records using the body fat scale to Apple Health, where BMI, weight, height, fat percentage, and more can be found in Apple Health's body measurements, giving you a clear and comprehensive picture of your health. You'll need to enable health privacy permissions for Smart Life.

During the use process, how to ask questions and comments can be feedback to us in the "FAQ & Feedback" in the app.You can also contact us in the following ways:

Stay connected to the one you love, even when you’re apart. Join your partner on Couple Joy to have fun together, strengthen your bond, and discover new things about each other.

STAY CONNECTED

- Personalize your screen with adorable couple widgets.
- Share your mood and see how your partner is feeling in real-time.
- Track the distance between you and watch it shrink as you get closer to seeing each other.
- Celebrate your love by tracking how long you’ve been together.

GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER

- Play fun games and uncover new sides of your partner.
- Build intimacy with meaningful daily questions.
- Chat in real-time about your quiz answers for deeper connections.

GROW TOGETHER

- Watch your relationship thrive as you extend your daily streak.
- Count down to birthdays, anniversaries, and exciting future plans!
- Capture your journey together with photos in your shared journal.

Couple Joy has everything you need to make your relationship even more special. It’s the perfect space to have fun, create lasting memories, and stay close—no matter the distance.

Download Couple Joy and invite your partner today!

developer: Hangzhou Dong Bin Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
The DMSS app can enhance your security management efficiency. You can watch real-time surveillance videos and play them back anytime, anywhere, via Wi-Fi or cellular networks. If a device alarm is triggered, DMSS will immediately push an instant notification to you.

DMSS offers：
1. Real-time Live View：
You can view real-time surveillance videos from the added devices anytime, anywhere, to help you better monitor the safety of your home environment.

2. Video Playback：
You can quickly find the events you care about by date and event category, and playback the required historical video footage.

3. Instant Alarm Notifications：
You can subscribe to different alarm events according to your needs.  When an event is triggered, you will immediately receive the message notification.

4. Device Sharing
You can share the device with family members for shared use and assign them different usage permissions.

5. Alarm Hub
You can add a variety of peripheral accessories to the alarm hub to provide warnings for potential theft, intrusion, fire, water damage, and other situations. In case of an unforeseen event, DMSS can immediately activate alarms and send out danger notifications.

6. Visual Intercom
You can add visual intercom devices to engage in video calls between the device and the DMSS, as well as perform functions like locking and unlocking.

7. Access Control
You can add access control devices to check the current status of doors and view unlock records, as well as perform remote unlocking operations on the doors.

Show your true colors with MyScreen—customize everything, from your Lock Screen to icons, charging animation, and widgets, until your personality shines through it all!

MyScreen’s ultimate goal is to make your device more YOU and make you smile every time you lay eyes on it! Want to stand out from the crowd? Try our eye-catching live wallpapers. MyScreen offers everything you need and more to customize your phone, right down to the watch faces.

The app offers a full range of customization options to showcase your unique taste and personality with loads of beautiful wallpapers, themes, watch faces, keyboards, icons, and awesome widget sets. Give your Home & Lock Screens a total makeover and customize until your device becomes a fingerprint of your character!


With MyScreen, you get access to: 
– Mesmerizing live wallpapers
– Stylish themes with keyboards
– Striking static wallpapers
– AI wallpaper generator
– AI avatar generator 
– Widgets for Home & Lock Screens
– Slick watch faces
– Hypnotic charging animations
– Stylish icon packs
– Home Screen packs
– Trendy patterns and the freshest designs
– Thematic categories
– Wallpapers with quotes and sayings
– One-tap downloads to Photos

Starting from iOS 17, users can additionally enjoy dynamic StandBy screens and handy interactive widgets!

With our app, you can
– Fully redesign your Lock & Home Screen,
– Browse through the extensive wallpaper & watch faces catalog,
– Easily save wallpapers to Photos,
– Check how your wallpaper looks on your Lock & Home Screen without leaving the app.

Download slick wallpaper collections: Hot, Sports, Anime, Cars, Neon, Space, Nature, Animals, Urban, Holiday Mood, Abstract & Patterns, Microchips, Quotes, Shelves, and lots more awesome wallpaper styles to fit your taste! 


Enjoy the playful, mesmerizing charm of MyScreen's diverse collection of live wallpapers and themes. We have tons of adorable, funny, and even trippy live wallpapers that add a touch of personality to your device.


Looking for wallpapers and themes that reflect your own culture? We’ve got those! With our Local collection, you can infuse your screen with endearingly familiar motifs, reflecting the uniqueness of your ethnic background.

If you like the app, please rate us on the App Store. This will help us deliver more awesome content in the future!

Please note that:
Live wallpapers work on iPhone 6S or later, except for iPhone SE. With other iPhone models, they can be used as static wallpapers.
Live wallpapers are supported on all versions of iOS except iOS 16.

UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES

– You can subscribe for unlimited access to all the app’s features.
– Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
– Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.


The prices are in US dollars. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country.

Privacy Policy: http://wallpapers4k.me/wallpapersfree/privacy 
Terms of Use: http://wallpapers4k.me/wallpapersfree/terms

Main features available,

* Find your Ascendant (Lagnaya).
* Calculate Birth Charts (Lagna, Nawamsa, Bhava).
* Find your Yogas and the results of them.
* Find your Predictions.
* Find your Dasa predictions.
* Use Pancha Pakshi to calculate auspicious time.
* Match horoscope or Porondam matching.
* Find Erashtaka.
* Find planet transits.
* Find Rahu Kala Time.
* Today your Planetary positions (Graha Charaya).
* Find Dasa Sheshaya and Vimshottari Dasha including Mahadashas, Antra-dasha, Widasha, and Sukshama-dasha.
* Find Auspicious time with Day, Nakshatra, Thithiya, Yogaya, Karanaya, Horawa (Panchanga) and Positions of planets and without Rahu Kalaya.
* Find all the Hora of the day.
* Find an auspicious time now.
* Choosing a suitable auspicious.
* Find auspicious letters for your name.
* Knowing your existing faults.

* Bawa, Rashi, and Nekath are shown in a circular graph.
* Locations of Sri Lanka are available offline.
* Google Maps and Google Place are available to find your birthplace.
* If there is only a planetary position without birth details, enter the planetary positions and get other information such as Palapala.

* Find all the information related to House (Bhava).
* Find all the information related to the zodiac sign (Rasi).
* Find all the information related to the planets (Grahas).
* Find your Panchanga(Thithi, Vaara, Yoga, Nakshatra, Karana).
* Find the information related to your Nakshatra.
* Find the degree of ascendant and each planet’s degree (Sputa).
* Find your ruling deity, Dharma deity, Ishta deity, Guru deity, etc

* Calculate your Divisional Charts(D1, D2, D3, D4, D7, D9, D10, D11, D12, D16, D24, D30, D60).
* Make horoscopes of Bhava and Krishnamurti.
* Make solar and lunar horoscopes.
* Find Hora Lagna, Ghati Lagna, Varnada Lagna, Paka Lagna, Arudha Lagna etc.
* Find your Arudha Lagna.
* Find your Arudha Pada.
* Find your Atmakaraka and other karaks.
* Find your exaltation (Uchcha) and debilitation (Neecha) planets.
* Find the inauspicious lords of your Dreshkana 22, Navamsha 64, Obstructive Places, etc.
* Find Shat Wargaya of Planets.
* Find Ashtaka Wargaya of Planets.
* Change Ayanamshaya.

* Some features are available only for paid users.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Quickly and easily connect and control your smart home devices through SmartThings.
SmartThings is compatible with 100s of smart home brands. So you can control all of your smart home gadgets in one place, including your Samsung Smart TV and smart home appliances.
With SmartThings, you can connect, monitor and control multiple smart home devices quicker and easier. Connect your Samsung smart TVs, smart appliances, smart speakers and brands like Ring, Nest and Philips Hue - all from one app.
Then control your smart devices using voice assistants including Google Assistant

[Key Features]
- Control and check in on your home from wherever you are
- Connect your smart devices across many different brands to work together by setting ‘scenes’
- Build routines that are set on time, weather, and device status, so your home runs smoothly in the background
- Allow shared control by giving access to other users
- Receive status updates about your devices with automated notifications
- Talk to your devices using Google Assistant
- Track, monitor and save money on energy with SmartThings Energy. See how much your home and compatible Samsung devices cost to run, and try various energy saving features, such as AI saving mode, or schedule devices to run during off peak hours.
- Receive recipe recommendations by scanning meal kits, wine, and meat. Plan, shop and prep meals with the help of SmartThings Cooking 

※ Some features may not be available in all countries.

[App requirements]
Some mobile devices may not be supported.
- iOS 16.0 or later / iPhone 6s or later / iPad mini 4 or later

※ App permissions
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 

[Required access permissions]
-
 
[Optional access permissions]
• Bluetooth: to find nearby devices using Bluetooth or BLE
• Microphone: Used to set up ultrasonic sensor-equipped devices
• Camera: Scan QR codes.
• Location: to automate actions using GPS (GPS optional)
                    Used to find Wi-Fi information to add devices with iOS 13 or later versions
• Contacts: Used to verify user information that will be used when sending text messages

**Lesi** is a vibrant fashion community app that connects style enthusiasts worldwide. Discover the latest trends, share your unique outfits, and get inspired by fashion-forward individuals from around the globe.

### Core Features
- **AI Fashion Assistant**: Get personalized outfit recommendations and AI-powered fashion scoring
- **Style Discovery**: Browse curated fashion content and trending outfits
- **Photo Sharing**: Capture and share stunning outfit photos
- **Personal Style Sharing**: Upload and share your daily looks with the community
- **Fashion Community**: Connect with like-minded fashion enthusiasts and influencers
- **Style Inspiration**: Get outfit ideas and fashion tips from real users
- **Social Features**: Like, comment, and follow your favorite fashion creators

Trash to Cash is an innovative mobile app that transforms waste management into a rewarding experience. Designed to promote sustainability and responsible recycling, the app connects users with waste collection centers, recyclers, and buyers who pay for recyclable materials.

Key Features:
- Easy Waste Collection – Schedule pickups for recyclable materials from your home or business.
- Earn Rewards – Get paid for recyclables like plastic, paper, metal, and e-waste.
- Find Nearby Centers – Locate recycling centers and drop-off points easily.
- Track Earnings & Impact – Monitor how much you’ve earned and your contribution to environmental sustainability.
- Community Engagement – Join eco-friendly challenges and spread awareness about waste management.

With Trash to Cash, turning waste into wealth is simple, profitable, and eco-friendly!

Connect your IoT home appliances to the LG ThinQ app.
Enjoy effortless product control, smart care, and convenient automation in one simple solution.

■ Discover the convenience of smart home appliances through the Home tab.
 - Control your IoT home appliances from anywhere with our app.
 - Get personalized recommendations for managing appliances based on usage history.
 - Find out ways to better make use of the app's features from "Explore"
■ Upgrade your products from ThinQ Play.
 - Use your products more efficiently and with greater ease by introducing new features to products you are currently using.
 - Upgrade your products based on your lifestyle and personal preferences.
■ Monitor your energy consumption data quickly.
 - Use Energy Monitoring to compare your power usage with your neighbors’.
 - Set energy saving goals and get usage status notifications to help save energy more efficiently.
 - Receive care services for your products all in one place.
■ Handle everything from troubleshooting to service requests directly from the app.
 - Use the Smart Diagnosis function to check your product’s status.
 - Book a service visit from a professional engineer for an accurate diagnosis and inspection.
■ Conveniently reference LG home appliance manuals in one place.
 - Access a range of content, including function descriptions and essential usage solutions for products.

※ Services and features may vary depending on your product model and your country or region of residence.

The following access permissions are necessary for the ThinQ app. 
All the access permissions requested are optional access permission, so even if you do not allow them, you can still use the app except for the related services. (Including OS Request Permissions such as "Siri & Search", "Notification", "Background App Refresh", and "Cellular Data")

[Optional Access Permissions]
• Location
- To find and connect to nearby Wi-Fi when registering the product.
- To set and save the home location in Manage Home
- To search for and use information about current locations, such as weather.
- To check your current location in the "Smart Routines" function.

• Camera
- To take a profile picture
- To share a home or account scanned from a QR code.
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product..(미국 Only)
- To use the AI oven Cooking Record feature.
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information 

• Photo, Media, File
- To use the smartphone's storage when downloading the information of the product to be connected
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product.

- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.

- To obtain the device connecting Wi-Fi info when adding devices

• Notifications

# Gululu: Pro Photo Filters & Editing – Turn Ideas Into Visuals  
Gululu’s immersive full-screen tool transforms creative concepts into polished photos—here’s its standout edge:  


## 13 Pro Filters + Full Control  
Ditch generic effects: 13 pro filters, plus real-time previews (see edits first!) and 0-100% intensity sliders. Dial drama up or down—your call.  


## Gesture Edits: Fast & Simple  
Skip clunky menus: Pinch to zoom, swipe to rotate, or long-press to compare edits to the original. Tweaks take seconds.  


## All-in-One Editing Kit  
Beyond filters: Crop, adjust brightness/contrast/saturation, add text, or stick on fun accents—cover every edit need.  


## A UI That Feels Like a Delight  
Elegant purple theme, glass-texture layers, and smooth animations—editing becomes a pleasant moment.  


## Undo/Redo: No Mistakes, Just Fun  
Infinite undo/redo lets you experiment freely. Whether you’re a casual snapper or creative enthusiast, Gululu makes pro-level edits easy.
